content.detailedDescription: It was 9:45 p.M. i decided to go out and stand on my front porch to see how cold it was out! the wind was really blowing and i decided to look up at the sky as i was looking i seen this orb type object moving as if it were a star but just as i seen it coming into view the orb became very bright for like 2 seconds and as it was moving it became dim again.I watched it as it faded away and dissipated it was no airplane nor any type craft that we have no noise or anything. the orb looked like the very one's seen on you tube and other web site's. it looked like the very one that me and my friend from ohio seen out in my back yard over the past summer when we were setting on lawn chairs in my yard. he's a witness also to what we had seen up close i believe it's the same craft or just one of it's kind. i feel like they are observing either me and my family or just the area in general but the amazing thing that draws my attention is the very brightness that comes off the craft like they are trying to get my attention so i notice them well sam if you are reading this please give the people your testimony of what we seen over the summer in my back yard!  if anyone has seen the same origin please contact me jacob1973@msn.Com  thank you
content.summary: Seen star like orb that became very bright after noticing it from my front porch

content.detailedDescription: I looked up to see a shiny silver rectangular object in the sky. sunlight was glinting off its surface. i was at work in thomaston , ga and had left the building to gather supplies from a storage building when i saw it. it was silent with no jet stream although it was lower than most jets fly i could see how large it was. it should have jet stream if it was a plane. i took four pics with my camera fone but was unable to id anything until i sent them to my e mail and could view the pics on the computer screen. i observed the object for less than one minute before it was out of view. i had hoped for a clear photo since i could see it clearly with the naked eye. of course when i was able to look at my pics on my email at home all thar could be seen were more "blurry ufo pics"! im not sure what made me look up and see the object unless it was the bright glare of sunlight glinting off the object. i looked at it for a few seconds then quickly snapped some shots with the camera fone. i was excited to have seen something unusual at that time of day.
content.summary: Shiny silver object silent with no jet stream and no wings.

content.detailedDescription: Monday, october 27th, 2008.  i came home to my apartment (near the main campus of university of california-irvine) from school later than usual (around 7:15 or so).  it was foggy (more dense in some areas than others).  i went into my apartment and did a few things and then decided to print some papers.  i remembered that the printer in the graduate villa next door did not have any ink (i tried printing a few hours earlier).  therefore, i had to walk towards the main office (clubhouse). i walked outside along the main path between the apartment buildings and when i got to one of the entrances to the parking lot, i looked over to my left and saw a triangular shaped craft descend over the metal fence across the street. the craft was silent and had three, white, circular lights under it.  the craft itself was a dull metallic, gray color(like the metallic color of the keyboard for the dell inspiron 1525) and the edges of the triangle were rounded, not pointed. the street that it flew across is not busy.  it is only used by residents and shuttles for the residents.  at the time, there was a field across the street where the university was clearing land for new apartments.  i saw the underside of the craft and some of the back.  from what i could see, it looked like it did not have significant height to it. it looked surprisingly  flat.  the craft did not look like someone could be inside of it, unless they were laying down.  it must have flown very close to the tops of the apartment buildings judging from the angle and speed that it descended over the fence.  the portion of the descent that i happened to see took about three seconds. it really surprised me because it was silent.  i thought i was seeing a reflection in my glasses.  however, the field was really foggy and i could see the craft correct itself and fly horizontal to the ground.  i could see the lights under it illuminate the fog.  it looked like a car's headlights shining in the fog pointing towards the ground (but the length of the light beam was not long enough to shine directly on the ground underneath).  the craft did not stay level once it crossed the fence.  it smoothly ascended, but was still pretty low for a flying object.  this happened three to four seconds after the descent over the fence. the lights in the fog told me that i did not see a mere reflection in my glasses!  i walked toward the field because the craft disappeared (which was probably due to the fog) but i did not see anything else.  i stayed outside trying to look for it for the next 10 minutes, while i called my boyfriend and my friend to tell them what i saw.  i later thought that since it did not have height -from what i could see, that it may have been controlled by a remote by the military.  however, i don't know why the military would fly over a small construction site and fly so close to civilians' apartments especially if they had the technology to even make a silent craft. i would say all of this happened sometime between 7:50pm and 7:58pm est.
content.summary: Triangle shaped craft, medium in size, three circular  white lights under it, silent , dull gray color.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside watering some new apple trees i had recently planted enjoying the darkness and cool breeze when a bright light in the sky caught my attention. obviously not a conventional aircraft because the speed was incredible. not a metor, i see those here all the time.

fast moving  silent object at approximately 10 thousand feet moving west to east. the object was large bright and starlike with no blinking red or colored lights that might indicate the miss identification of a conventional aircraft.

the brilliant white object moved across half of the visable sky in level flight in less than 5 seconds. (out here in west texas the visible sky is vast and horizon to horizon without obstructions from tall buildings, trees etc, with local topography almost flat.)

it then made a course correction bearing almost due east and then shortly therafter vanished or winked out. commercial and military aircraft were in the same portion of the sky at the time of this strange sighting.

heavy b1 activity at dyess air force base prior to the sighting with the roar of b1 takeoffs in the background during the sighting. bright clear night with unlimited visability

i live close to dyess air force base and i am used to seeing all kinds of aircraft during the day and night but this was something extraordinary.

i observed a similar aircraft close to the base several months ago with similar flight characteristics
content.summary: Large bright white fast mover.

content.detailedDescription:
Saw what looked like a star. but seemed like it was spinning. it had flashing lights, blue, white, and red. it was pretty far away, over the ocean, maybe.
hovering pretty steady. would move up and down a little bit. the red lights seemed ti be more laser loike.It seemed kike the red light would flash out, at times it would feel like as if a laser was pointed right on in my eye.

not a star, not an airplane, not a helicpoter.
definetly a ufo.
content.summary: Red white and blue - lights near los angeles.

content.detailedDescription:
About 22:30hours =10:30pm a ball shaped object the size of a house about 3,000 feet in the air some some say 200 feet in air it was glowing a  gold color it was moving but was over a u.S.Goverment installation 1501 bannister road the u.S.Dept.Of energy.Alos there was several other sightings over secure u.S.Military area's in the greater kansas city area's both missouri and kansas.This object moved in a west kansas city  missouri and west kansas city kansas about 20 mph .It made no sound and caused no-electrical black-outs in radio or television systems.Also it was stated that the object was at 200 feet in air and it was the size of a car or a compact car.Also military and cilivian personnel had the sightings but out of fear of going to prison for 15 years and a $20,000.00 fine or both.Military personnel want to remain -(anonymous)
--------------------------------------------------------------------
i didnot make a sighting i am only reporting what i was told.
           james , allen , tutt , jr -mufon field investigator 
                          i.D.# 7606
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: A ball shaped object about the size of a house glowing gold color.

content.detailedDescription:
My dad, my sister, and i were going out to the store, and just when we where    
driving out of the court i looked out the passenger window when i saw an object in the sky about the size of an oven. it was round-like. to me it looked like an egg of silly puddy when you flatten it slightly. the blunt end was going forwarded(or the front). at first it looked as if it might of been on fire, that lasted for about five seconds. it was a short tail only about three feet long and a orange glow, it came directly from the back not consuming the hole thing. then it went out, but i could still see the silhouette of it of it because the end if it was still glowing vary slightly. it was going south south east, i saw the object for about ten minutes until it went behind the trees. it could not have been a shooting star i know because  my dad used to be a meteorologist, and he has told me what a shooting star looks like, i have also seen a few my self. this thing i saw was too low, at about the hight of 90ft. also if it was a shooting star when it went out that would mean it burnt up, but i saw it for about ten seconds after it stooped glowing, and it wasn't broken up. it might have been a low meteor, but i think thats a small chance.
content.summary: A glowing object that went out but did not brake up.

content.detailedDescription: On friday march 20, 2009 shortly before eight pm i went outside to look at the sky. to my surprise i thought i saw a large white shooting star descending to earth. lost sight of it behind a building.Almost instantly i saw it or something very similar shooting up from the same area i watched the object disappear. this object was white and arching up toward the south. as it gained altitude it seemed to have smaller shooting stars coming from the original object. it continued up until it disappeared. as soon as it disappeared another or the same object appeared traveling parallel to the ground producing smaller versions of itself until they too disappeared. this continued for approximately fifteen minutes and culminated in a white ball turning red with a green fuzzy area around it. this too faded from view then i saw an orange glow that consumed approximately ten percent of the southern sky. during the entire event i never heard a sound. nor do i recall seeing the laddder in both pictures.I was not the only witness as someone sent in a report that very night form peoria az. i did not have the digital rebel xsi 12 mega-pixel with a 100-300mm lens at maximum extension. i grabbed my camera to take the attached photos but did not have a tripod available which resulted in the blurry photos. multiple objects appear in the photos due to the length of time the shutter had to remain open to gather enough light. i did get some video but for some reason i can not send the files or copy them to a dvd.
content.summary: Thought it was a large shooting star but soon determined it was very different.

content.detailedDescription: On 02/20/09 at 1239am i heard what sounded like rumbling from thunder.I looked up from my front window and seen 2 huge unexplained air crafts (triangular in shape with blue and white lights in a circular motion with one center white light in front of craft in search or scanning mode.Did not hear any noise from aircrafts) descending from the southwest in front of my house (approximately 150 feet above my neighbor's house) and began flying through the neighborhood not to far above the houses and flying north to south over shadeland avenue. notified impd to see if there was a search for a suspect with helicopters. they did not have anyone in the area. informed channel 13 as of today no results. no other witness accounts to my knowledge as of today. these air crafts were not helicopters even though they were flying in a search pattern.In addition to description there was a long rectangular box with small boxes red in color could have been their propulsion system on the rear of crafts. the approximate width was about 45 ft for each craft. i did not need binoculars to see them they were very close just above the neighbors house. when they descended one was on top of the other before they moved about the house/tree tops searching/scanning. no other sighting after 245am.I did not capture event on video nor photograph.If they return i will attempt to video record air crafts.
content.summary: Ufo sighting east side of indy (story posted on roger marsh site).

content.detailedDescription: I had just returned to cape may court house from my college located in mays landing. i went to arby's to pick up three of my friends and on our way back to my car we noticed an extremely bright light coming directly toward us. we were very alarmed at the brightness of the light and how low it was flying. all four of us stood outside my car and speculated on what kind of aircraft it was and it wasn't until it flew directly overhead that we suspected it may be something other than a conventional airplane. and certainly wasn't a helicopter either because as it passed overhead it made absolutely no sound whatsoever. what was even more interesting was when we noticed a second much smaller lighted craft that was traveling above the first craft at a 45 degree upwards angle traveling at exactly the same speed. the second craft had to be very small because it was not until the first craft flew directly overhead that we even noticed there was a second craft of some kind traveling above and behind the first craft. i know they were traveling at the same speed because the separation between them did not change. during this part of the event, we began to notice a great many more very similar looking craft flying everywhere we looked. this continued for over 3 hours and we had been traveling to various parts of the county throughout the night so it was not simply relegated to one area. these craft almost seemed to be tracking something, but if it wasn't for the first sighting we would have probably just thought they were low flying planes that were searching the area for something. i estimate sighting a craft about 30 times in the 3 hour period, but then we began to see the same type of craft when three of the four of us present during the original sighting began to see the same types of vehicles floating silently about the sky. this sighting took place in two places. the first was the wildwood villas, and here is where we witnessed many different strangely lit craft all scouring the area, and most peculiarly we witnessed a very bright white point of light hovering at about a 30-40 degree angle from our line of sight, and i'd say no more than 10-15 miles from where we stood. it was very low to the ground and considering the blanket of cloud cover over the area i find it difficult to believe it was a star or venus. not to mention when we watched it eventually begin to move as the other craft did, but not before yet another of the silent craft flew directly overhead. then we left the villas and i took my friends back to their house in whitesboro.  there were the same flashing lights as before, only this time it looked as though the object was either two very closely approximated craft with the same light pattern, or one craft that was very rapidly shifting position. the lights appeared in one spot one second, and then seemingly defying the laws of physics the light would move 1 or 2 degrees to the left or right making it seem...You know what? i have no idea what to make of it. it was so unusual, and i would love to know what that and all the other craft in the sky really were. then as quickly as they had appeared, the craft were gone and i did not see any more for the remainder of the evening. i wish my cell phone camera didn't have problems adjusting the light level enough to take a picture of what i was seeing. it was almost as though these craft were making an attempt to imitate commercial aircraft light patterns but terrestrial craft do not a: share such incredibly close airspace such as the very first sighting out in front of arby's because of the very real danger of a midair collision. b the second smaller craft tracking the first was too small to even be an aircraft, and c aircraft and helicopters are not silent. i hope this report is detailed enough, but i would be surprised if you've received any other reports because of the flashing light pattern that could easily be explained away by saying they're merely low level aircraft. my friends and i however were lucky enough to get an overhead fly by and what we saw did not add up to anything that we have seen before. i live directly under multiple flight paths and i have seen planes and helicopters in the skies over my head for my entire life. this was not a plane. i have no asked my friends if they wish to publicly talk of this, but i am sure they will all anonymously confirm my report. but out of respect for them and their privacy i need to find out if i have their consent. if this is of significant interest you may contact me and i can most likely set up an interview with one or more of them. two more things.  i am unsure if there were actual planes in the area, because there were so many countless lights in the sky all flying in nondescript flight paths, so for the questions below i am going to say that some of these had to be airplanes because of the part of airspace my county sits underneath. finally during the second night as the rapidly shifting lights on the craft flew overhead i was overcome with a very acute pain and stiffness in my right leg. this continued when i got back in my car and until shortly after i left. yet unlike the first night, i was not as worried or afraid. by the time i got home, i was filled with an overwhelming sense of calm and serenity as though i had no reason to fear what i saw. my one friend seemed very frightened however. so much so that after the second night of sightings, he said he, "wasn't touching that one." he didn't want to continue speculating on the objects origin or intentions in any way shape or form.
content.summary: Initial appearence of large number of low flying airplanes but unfamilliar light pattern and silent when passing overhead.

content.detailedDescription: I was feeding my dog when i saw some unusual stars.  but i looked and saw a craft hovering about 150 feet in the air. it was also above the treeline. and it was a stary and cloudy night but were the ufo was the clouds and stars were gone. it was totally sighlent!!!!!!!!! and it just huvored there for a little while then shot off and the treeline kept me from seeing any spacific direction. i first though it was an air plane, but they make noise and don't hover. it was the size of an suv, and had 2 white round lights in the front of the bottom and 1 red one in the back of the bottom it also thad strips of white light bettwen the lights was black
content.summary: It sat over the tree line no noise!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! then just shot off.

content.detailedDescription: Im 68 years old and i need to tell what i saw,other than my family.This was many years ago,in 1956,in san antonio,texas,i went over to a friends house to have dinner with her and her family,afterwards she and i went out side to sit on the "stoop"as we called it,where the sidewalk goes down to the street,there were 3 steps and we sat down like we always did and then laid back on the warm sidewalk from the heat of the day,we were looking up into the sky,which was a very clear nite and we could see thousands of stars,we just tried to find the stars we knew and the mikley way and then the air just seamed to get so still and it became very quiet.We sat up and all of a sudden there was this huge round light,so very bright(like the ones they put up at a county fair,and light up the sky,but this light was thousands of times brighter,i put my hand in front of my face to shield the light so i could see just what it was,we started to scream and her parents and sister and brother came running out of the front door onto the porch and the light went faster than a lighting strike to the porch,it lit up their house and porch and they looked like they were frozen,as it was shining on them we could see just how big this disk was and it was huge,there were all of the red,blue,white,and a few green lights going all around it,and there were all kinds of strange pipe-like rods on it,and several windows,it moved very slow kind of rotateing just a little but stayed is the same place,there was no sound,no air moving the trees,it just hovered over all of us,then as fast as it came it was gone.We got up and ran to the porch and it was as if we were moving very slow.As we reached the porch he parents did not say a word to us,nor did her sister or brother,we all went into the house and her father called my dad to come over.When go got there my friends dad told him what had happened,and he needed to take me home,they were scared to death.At that time my dad had woked at kelly field for many years,and her dad asked him to see if he could find out something about just what we saw,when we got home her called a friend who was a major in the security divison at kelly,he told him what we saw and asked him to see if anything had come across on the radar,he called back later and that is when things got very hairy,if you know what i mean.Dad worked un a gen.Ramey and others and went to all of the bases you have shown on the show.Several of the officers came to the house and talked to me,then went to my friends home.We were told to not tell anyone,but dad kept on it.My friend and her family never said a word after all of the officers went to their home,but dads friend told us there was something on the radar,and that was all he was going to say.For years while sleeping at nite,i would be awakened by a very bright lite,this went on for many years,i asked my friend if she had they same thing going on and she said yes,but did not tell her folks,and that she had not told anyone about what we saw and her family never did either. dad has passed and mom is 99.I have told my husband and children and grandson about it,and as far as my friend i do not know where she is,and her family are all gone now.I need to tell you about this more,i can still see it in my mind,i will never forget what i saw and i keep looking to the nite sky to see if it will come back.Please let me know if you know anything about this from texas during the summer of 1956.Thank you sharon
content.summary: The most amazing thing i have ever seen, very quiet, very bright light, and very large, white, blue, red lights, the air just stood sitll.

content.detailedDescription: Submitted cropped photo of this prior but had incorrect date of 10-14 on report.
content.summary: Took picture looking up eastern sky. saw peculiar light. didn,t see object until did auto level edit using adobe photoshop.

content.detailedDescription:
Sighting
	it was february 26, 2009 sometime around 10:30 - 11:00 p.M. while returning home from thursday night���s class, traveling westbound on hwy 114 approaching the outskirts of rhome, texas, that i became aware of two red objects low on the horizon just slightly to the right of the roadway ahead of me.  these two red orbs were pulsing on and off at a rate of about 20 -30 times a minute.  the on to off timing was uniformly equal and pulsing in unison.  the size of the red orbs were slightly smaller than your thumbnail held at arms��� length and the shape was perfectly circular with a very defined edge, no fuzziness or light diffusion.  the distance between the two orbs was approximately the width of your fist at arms��� length.  there was some relative motion between the two objects:  the one on the left appeared steady on its course while the one on the right changed its altitude dipping down and then back to its level position.  as i continued driving due west the objects appeared to be drifting to the left or southward and now the roadway was turning slightly northward to a west-north-west heading and the view of the objects were being obstructed by trees.  i thought i would pull over and stop to watch these red orbs and continued forward to have a clearer view now appearing through my side window.  the clear view was now coming up, but before i pulled off to the shoulder there appeared what i would describe as a burst from between and above the plane of the two orbs not unlike a jet going supersonic with its wing producing a shock wave.  i had traveled about a mile in this episode so it was visible to me for about one minute.  i continued onward where the road crosses over the railroad tracks to view southward the moonless night sky but could see no lights or movement there.
	in review of this event i could not make any determination of the distance, speed, or direction involved or if any sound was made as my car windows were closed.  looking at a map of the area shows that when i first sighted the object it could have been over rhome, aurora or boyd, or beyond by 100���s of miles, or it could have been just beyond the tree line right over hwy 287 just a mile in front of me.  at the time, i thought the direction of travel was southward, but who���s to say that i was actually seeing it departing straight away from me (west) on just a slight southward track.  if that were true perhaps those who reside in newark, azle, reno, or springtown may have seen this occurrence.  i was a passive observer of this non-threatening event and i know of no other witnesses as traffic was very, very light and the only other car well ahead did not stop.
content.summary: Two red circular orbs slowly drifting southward low in night sky.

content.detailedDescription: My fiance my mom and i were downtown by the river walk and in the sky i spotted a very bright light and it shot down a beam of light so i got my moms and fiances attention and we watched these disc shaped balls of light beam down light that reached the ground they would appear and disapear and re-appear i would say there were 4 or 5 of them the sighting reminded me of the phonix lights but more intense because of the beams of light they shot down this is the second time this year i have reported a ufo but this is just more unexplainable than the last experiance.....The crazy thing is that i had a dream just like this event occur just a week ago now i have more unanswered questions that i wish i could answer the sighting made me feel extremely enlighted and very happy,i am also kind of wondering if this has to do with the recent cow mutilations here in colorado?
content.summary: Large disc, sphere shaped balls of light with beaming lights.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside when i saw a very low "airplane" but the i noticed i formed a square one thing was that it was low but it was a square it was going slightly faster than an airplane and had 5 light 4 to form a square and on in the middle
content.summary: It was a square blinking.

content.detailedDescription: I'm only writing this because i saw alot of reports on here last week of the same thing. i was inside my living room when out of the corner of my eye i saw a very bright flash like lightning, but the instantaneous explosion sound was in no way thunder or even a lightning strike. it was definatly strange.
content.summary: Bright flash and very loud "pop."

content.detailedDescription: Saw an orange object in the sky above my house and i managed to capture some video footage with my mobile phone then the object just disapeared, video footage is on youtube http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=d5nn2cvsqio it was very big and moving silently.
content.summary: Orange orb.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside in my back yard. i always have my eyes to the sky and happened to have my camera in reach. this object was not blinking and flying away from me. (not airplane headlights) this could very well be the space station if it flew over tucson around 6pm because it faded out like a sattalite would do as it rounded the earth. what has me perplexed is the way the photographs turned out. you know the classic squiggly lines of light that other people capture on film, i got some of those.
later i took more pictures of lights in the sky, such as airplanes and stars to see if the same effect was happening due to me either shaking my hands or the wind. i have one very focused photo that i distinctively remember holding my hands on the fence to steady myself. still it was extremely "wiggly". i also have a few daytime photos of a cylinder type object that flew over davis monthan airforce base here in tucson and then over the flight line and dissappeared. i did not see it disappear beacuse i was trying to find it in my binoculars but my son tyler said he saw it "flash out". one other one over the base, seperate incident, i was on my roof alone skywatching and saw what i thought was a firework or even a flare (being over the base and all) but this explosion was different. it seemed like a firework that exploded orange but before its full potential explosion size it was compressed into a flat line and then "flashed out". this made me get off of my chair i have up on the roof because a portion of this "explosion" was obscured by a tree. as soon as i got up after the chair collasped on me, i steadied myself and it happened again a little to the left of the first one i saw. (about 3-4 seconds between the two of them)i would really like to know what that was. me, being a ufo believer i would say that it looked like two spacecraft entering light speed over dmafb. i don't have the knowledge to upload these pictures but i would like to get them in your hands.
content.summary: Went straight across the sky from nw to se then faded out. possible space station flyover. big bright light.

content.detailedDescription: Around 8:00 pm on april 2, 2009, i was alone in the back yard of a friend's house in santa cruz, ca, looking at the sky and noticed three lights moving exceptionally fast from east to west along the monterey bay coast.  they moved in unison, changed directions several times, then disappeared after about ten seconds.  the lights appeared to be a dull, dark red and did not flash or blink.  estimated altitude of several thousand feet.  no sound.  again, way faster than any plane or satellite.  about the same speed of a "shooting star" except these three lights changed directions and moved together.
content.summary: Three lights either in formation or part of one vehicle over monterey bay / santa cruz

content.detailedDescription:
Recored two films of the same object , one film on the way from nicosia to larnaca before the town by 23 km , and the other film when i arrived to my hotel exactley on the sea shore looking at larnaca.
the object was moving from north-east and heading to south-east of the island.
thanks.

[cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: This is [cms/tg/pid] ... last month march 13, 2009, i was visiting cyprus, on my way from nicosia to larnaca at 23 km distance before larnaca i recorded ufo by my mobile fone nokia 6111, another recording over the sea.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and myself were heading to monterey park after our work in century city via route 10, to 60 to 5 freeways. traffic was very heavy. upon transitioning to the 5 freeway heading south i saw four bright white lights, hoovering over towards the east approximately two to three miles away. i told my wife to look at them because they were very similar to the two bright white lights i saw the previous weekend at about ten pm in the evening over the mountains on the 5 freeway just before pyramid lake on the opposite side of the lake, on our way back to la from frazier park.
after we got off the 5 freeway at slauson, we headed east two miles past the 605 freeway and arrived at our destination. i looked up at the objects and they started to move west. the first object was moving about the speed of a helicopter however it was not a helicopter. there was no rotor blade and no rotor sound. it passed over us, but not directly over us. it was a few degrees north. my wife heard no sound but i heard a kind of low hum wind sound, that's the best way to describe it. it was low enough and light enough outside to see it's shape vaguely, which was sort of trapazoid with lights around it. the three remaining bright white light objects started moving westward also but did not pass us because we were in route to return to west la. we reached the 5 freeway which was like a parking lot. i saw one of the objects fly over the freeway. the bright light came from the east and passed over the freeway. i told my wife to look. as it passed over the freeway the one bright white light spread out into three bright white lights in a straight line.
i witnessed one light apparently splitting into three horizontal lights. as we reached the 60 freeway transition we saw the other lights further away in the sky moving sometimes separately and sometimes lining up in the sky. as we approached downtown i suggested we go to little tokyo for dinner as my wife was hungry. we got off the freeway at alameda. two of the objects had moved into view. one of the objects light went out and the other object moved off. 
i did not have my video camera with me. at first i thought the objects may be part of the police or a military exercise of some kind. if they were military aircraft they were unlike any i am familar with. i was most impressed by their ability to move slowly and aparently stop in air and their lack of noise/sound.
content.summary: First 4 separate bright light objects hovering in sky separate from each other.

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling on highway 70 outside of pima and noticed two lights that were appearing and then fading out over pima. i could not tell if they were attached to a craft or not. after i passed through pima a bright light got my attention above the horizon. as i turned to look six more lights showed up, three on each side of the first one making a v shape. i pulled the car over and grabbed my video camera and as i turned it on the lights faded out leaving only the original one which stayed on for several seconds longer. i wasn't able to get any video. the object was obstructing my view of the constelation orion and i watched trying to see what was there, it was very dark but i would guess the overall size to be 300-400 feet and approx 1000 feet off the ground and silent. i couldn't actually see the craft however i began to drive and noticed that as my position changed i was able to stars the object was blocking. after driving about a mile i reallized the stars blocked were the constalation orion. i turned around and drove opposite the way i had came and sure enought the stars along orions belt were blocked from my view again untill i was about a mile past where i had originally stopped. i have no idea what could be so large and not move. also the lights were very large and white had it not been for there size they could have easily been mistaken for stars and were situated in orions belt in a manner that could almost fit the stars positioning only the individual lights were much too large to pass for stars.
content.summary: Stationary bright white lights in a v formation.

content.detailedDescription: I was about to take some food from my house when i saw the strange object hovering near the rooftop. it was low and moving slowly and sometimes it was moving fast. i was shocked and grab my camera. i also noticed some signal interruptions with our radio the same with some appliances like cellphone and television. i was scared especially when it hovers just above us. it just disappeared from a really great speed.
content.summary: Large and metallic black and silver.

content.detailedDescription:
Blinking flashing rotating red blue  wnd white light to side no movement across horizon..


i was walking friends out and just looking up in the sky we noticed the lights my friend got out a pair of binoculars i looked first then he asked if i had a camera to catch some video  the objects were in the sw sky and kept flashing different color light red blue white rotating not moving like any fixed wing aircraft staying fixed in the sky also air traffic none in the area  usually flight path for john wayne  i grew up air force brat and seen lots of planes helecopters but this just is'nt right  and after 20 min i just got tired and went in
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Lights flashing in sw sky caught eyes walking friends out.

content.detailedDescription:
My boyfriend was driving me home from his house.  we were sitting at a stop light waiting for it to change to make a left turn, when we both noticed a white light.  it was a bright white circle, and it appeared to get bigger and brighter as if it were coming straight at us.  it suddenly took a sharp left turn and at unreal speeds zoomed across the sky and disapeared.  it looked like it left a light trail behind it as it moved which also disapeared almost immediatly.  the stop light turned green and we took a left onto the bridge.  the original sighting spot was now to our right.  the light globe appeard again only on the opposite side from which it disappeared to.  it appeared to travel in a giant circle, leaving the white light tail behind it.  when i turned my head to look at my boyfriend, i noticed that all the cars on the bridge, as well as us, were at a complete stop, staring at this sight.  after making about 3 circles, with out faiding or anything it just was gone, then suddenly appeared again in a different part of the sky, did a few more circles, then zoomed away leaving its light tail and was gone.  we could not figuere out what we had seen.  we thought of it maybe as airport lights or fireworks.  but i dont know why anyone would be doing that extreme of fireworks, and the airport is miles and miles away.  i started to cry because i could not explain what had just happened and it scared me. 

my mother and all my aunts tell me of stories of how they saw a ufo sitting in the parking lot of a local mark morris high school in longview washington, when they were very young.  probably around 1970. they described it as a disk with different colored lights flashing all the way around it then it went straight into the air and disapeared.
content.summary: Ball of light zooms back and forth across the sky at unreal speeds and disappears.

content.detailedDescription:
i'm keith,  needed some time off from looking for schematics of certain electronics to fix my computer that died on me? i went out for a walk to get some fresh air? i looked and saw a guy looking up in the sky to the west, south west, area and screaming look at the ufo? look at it? it flew by like a rocket out of nowhere? it hoverred for about an hour then hoverred to the south-westernly parrelle from highway 85 west. i have done readings/photos over time from (december till april)2008-2009 yr. first and so on untill now... the 4 spheres that looked as if it had specefically 3 orbs afire and one orb benieth the 2nd orb looking like this,               "* * *"
                                                                                                "*"  . computer programming in school? lights flashed, as if  they  were  imitating  stars, in the way they  glittered. as  on a cold  night? i have since gotten  a few  really good  video's that i think you will enjoy?? some aren't perfect,  but when a guy cant drive for trying to see the thing himself? i advise not too drive and look stop on the side first??!! here it is? there is a clear silouette from one of the anti-gravity thrusters on the backside of the ship. i was out side on the 3rd of december and using a new camera that i had grown fond of from cvs..I used it on occation for remembering trails as i walk along seeing and remembering my days, as a photographer, for olam mills studios. i've gotten some money shots for sale now? but i think the study of and the preservation of our race is first.. or atleased challenged?  i will put my faith in god and pray as need be. from what ive seen i'd be alittle nervous too if i were you.. more like a threatened kind of feel? not scared?  i later talked to senior?  and he told me that it went over the trees and hovered right up there? and pointed upwards? i had a whitness??Who  would of thought? well, still haven't seen (mufon)  here yet to get a statement?Hint, hint??  i swear on the bible that none of this is fabricated in any way, shape, or form...This is how i got it.Sorry? the video is alittle off since the driver saw it too?Or tried too? it screwed him up when he saw it? we almost wrecked? i had a camera on a pouch on my belt.And took it out click 3 times,  and i was on video mode? i held it untill the camera went  off. sorry i couldn't get a better video than this?Senior, that guy that was drinking, and i had a long talk about it and i found out it was hovering over the power station near here for some few minutes and stot off imediately..And stopped on a dime,as we southerners call it? and hovered for about an hour? i seemed to have a green ora around the ship? as a beam commong down widening as it gets to earth? or who or what ever it was interested in?Then it lifted up into a fast orbit above and sit there for the rest all of 30-40 minutes? but i didn't get to see it for the time it left. i used my windows picture viewer to blow up the pictures and see it up close? if any one has seen this get in touch with me? through the mufon coordinator or head of staf .
content.shape: Chevron,  Diamond,  Disc,  Flash,  Star-like,  Other
content.summary: Looked like 4 spheres as in my other videos this one might be true?

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo report march 2009 

having sighted approximately 25 ufo���s in the westlake, louisiana area between june and december 2008, and only one each in january and february 2009; i was hoping to report zero sightings for the month of march. however, this was not to be.

on saturday (march 28, 2009) at 1:30 pm while sitting in the parking lot of the old navy store near the intersection of la hwy 14 and i-210 in lake charles, louisiana; i observed what first appeared to be a small white aircraft approximately 3,000-4,000 high about a mile to the north traveling west.

the small white craft traveled at a speed comparable to a prop plane and did not seem that unusual as it could pass as a normal airplane flying in the distance (although the craft appeared somewhat flat). the craft also did not seem out of place as the old chennault air base was located a couple of miles to the east (the direction that the craft came from).

however, being ufo sensitized (or paranoid) i continued to observe the flight of the craft for several minutes. as the craft continued it���s westward movement, it must have banked somewhat as it soon gave the profile of a perfect white letter ���v��� in the totally clear blue sky. this started getting my attention, but still i assumed that perhaps i was watching a aircraft such as a white lear jet with swept back wings. i also assumed that perhaps i could not see the fuselage of the craft due to the distance of the craft or the angle of it���s flight, although i could not understand why not.

after watching the flying white ���v��� fly west about one minute, i observed the craft go point up and fly almost straight up vertical about another 1,000 feet. at this point, i was fairly convinced that the slow moving aircraft had to be a jet to make this maneuver, even though it���s speed matched the speed of a prop plane.

at this point i started digging in the center console of my pickup trying to locate my digital camera while keeping both eyes on the craft just in case this thing did anything else unusual or came close enough for a picture.

the point of the flying white ���v ��� never did turn in my direction, but appeared to be pointed north after it made it���s climb. the next thing i notice is the ���v��� flying backwards toward the south (with the point of the ���v��� pointed north). this really got my attention as the craft flew about half a mile west of me headed south at approximately 5,000 feet. at this point, the backward flying white ���v��� appeared to have one leg of the ���v��� approximately four times as wide as the other leg. (however, this may have only appeared so due to the angle of the craft in the sky). fanatically trying to rip my camera bag open without success, i finally looked down to find the zipper on the camera bag and removed the camera. when i looked back up, i could no longer see the backward flying white ���v���.
content.summary: White backward flying "v" shaped craft.

content.detailedDescription: Myself and my son and nephew were walking to my mothers apt. from my apt.We live in the same complex. i usually look up at the sky at night to see the stars as i enjoy them very much.I looked up and saw an circular object heading south towards san jose,ca. it was traveling soundless faster than the jetliners that pass over my complex on thier way to oakland international airport. my son and nephew saw the object and we were a little shaken if thats a good word for it. it was i would say the same altitude as the jetliners but headed in the other direction they usually take.It appeared to be a illuminated as a pale yellow light. i saw it a 2nd time this time 10 to 20 min later as i was going onto my mothers balcony. it was the same fast speed,a litttle higher altitude and this time going towards the area of niles canyon. it made us feel kinda scared . i was wjust wondering if there were other reports of this strange object. well thank you for your time to whom it concerns
content.summary: I and my son and nephew saw an object moving soundless thru the night sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west bound on highway 60 with the begining of avon park bombing range on my left south of me.I was a medical courier and had just made a delivery on the east coast i cant remember where.There was very little trafic hardly any thing but woods on both sides of the road.Suddenly slightly in front of me and off to my left there appeared an orange ball of light it wasnt big or didnt seem to be like maybe a large flair it deffanitly seemed like some sort of fire source i felt like maybe it was emiting smoke but i didnt see any.After maybe about 5 minutes other fire balls showed up some were larger than the first one a few trucks and cars passed from the opposite direction i wondered if the were seeing what i was seeing.I felt like pulling off the road just to watch them but i kept going there must have been about 10 of them when i saw a car getting ready to pull into the highway from a dirt road to my right i braked and pulled up next to the car and got out and walked up to the car. there were about 3 or 4 people in the car i asked the driver what those things were in the sky he was dark complectioned and started speaking in spanish i speak a little spanish and i thought he said something about a hunting club in broken english.He wasnt much help so i got in my car and kept going.More light began to appear some even bigger than the previos ones. i would estimate that they were no higher than a mile and no more than a mile away from the high way.After about 10 or 15 more of driving some of the larger ones started to devide thats the only word i can think of to describe it sort of like cellulre division the middle of the fire ball became more narrow till it got to the point that one ball became two one verticly a short distance hihgher than the other.Soon i would estimate that there were 20 of them with only 2 or 3 dividing.After about 5 or 10 minutes more of driving the werent in front of me any more but directly off to my left in another minute or so i came up upon a gas station that was closed bet still had its outside lights on i pulled into it and there was a station wagon with people in it. i got out of my car and walked up to a woman that was standing out side of the station wagon watching the lights there were 3 or four people inside the wagon i asked her what she thought those things where and she said she didnt know we watched in awe for maybe another 5 minutes. i asked her if maybe that there would be something about the lights in the news papers and she said o we will never know after a few more minutes one by one the lights went out.I was straining my eyes pretty hard as i watched them disapear and i thought i saw something like two blinking lights that seemed to be moving they were very dim like a very small distant star as all the lights disapeared the two separate blinking lights moved away till i couldnt see them.The whole scene seemed kind of an enjoyable event and i didnt feel threatened but i guess emotionally i was a little shaken up upon saying goodby to the people in the station wagon i continude west bound to my home on the west coast of florida.The rest of my trip was uneventful
content.summary: Started with one then went to 20 or so.
